Private Events
Nestled in the heart of Downtown Dunedin, Stirling Wine offers several intimate space options for Receptions, Networking Events, Birthday Parties, Bridal Showers, Baby Showers, Celebrations of Life and more. Room rates can be satisfied with Food and Drink Purchase. Non Profits, please contact us directly to arrange your next fundraising event with Room Rates waived dependent on date and day.
50% Deposit Required to reserve the desired space and is fully refundable up to 48 hours prior to your special event.
Place Deposit Now for Event
Request Menu Options & Check Availability.
Great People, Great Food, Great Wine
Experience Our Wine Club
Take the journey with Stirling Wine Club and explore how your Wines goes from seed, to vine, to our table and the entire process involved in nurturing flavors, intensity and style. Tantalize your flavor palate at Stirling Wine!
Join Wine Club Now

GET IN TOUCH TODAY
Contact Us
Do you have a question? Feel free to reach out to us.  We typically answer within 1 to 2 business days.  We look forward to helping you.

A Quaint Wine Bar in Beautiful Dunedin, Florida
Established in 2005, Stirling Wine features boutique wines from Around the World.  You will find Old World and New World  wines to enjoy by the glass, by the bottle or take to go!   Owners Rob and Luanne Haver personally select every bottle sold tasting 100% before presenting for sale in this local boutique wine shop.
In addition, artisan meats and cheeses are available to purchase and enjoy with your wine selection along with a growing list of local roast coffee.   Unique wine related gifts and accessories also available
.
Enjoy our relaxed and comfortable covered patio with some of the best Main Street views Downtown. Music is usually presented on the patio if the weather allows. Lovers of local live music, Stirling is a very popular weekend destination in Downtown Dunedin!
Space is available for rent to host private parties and networking events.
